Two-way Summary

Source: R/tbl_2way_summary.R
tbl_2way_summary.Rd

Summarize a continuous variable by two categorical variables

tbl_2way_summary(
  data,
  row,
  col,
  con,
  label = NULL,
  statistic = "{median} ({p25}, {p75})"
)

Arguments

data

a data frame
row

column name from data= making the rows of the resulting table
col

column name from data= making the columns of the resulting table
con

column name from data=of a continuous variable that will be summarized in each cell of the table
label

list of formulas specifying variables labels
statistic

string indicating the summary statistics. Default is "{median} ({p25}, {p75})"

Value

a gtsummary table

Example Output

Example 1

Examples

tbl_2way_summary_ex1 <-
  trial %>%
  tbl_2way_summary(grade, trt, marker)
